channel.title: Play with me?
channel.description: Okay so im new to minecraft multiplayer. I want to know if there is one or two other people that would be willing to create a world with me and play on it with me so i can get the hang of things. im not a noob to minecraft just to multiplayer. if you can either add my fb http://www.facebook.com/pandaboybrad?ref=tn_tnmn or my skype name is Pandaboybrad (idk exactly about the caps) please ^^
